languages.text: {n}Паскаль искоса смотрит на вас, и в голосе его вокс-синтезатора возникает потусторонняя глубина.{/n} "Конечно, вера опасна. Вера — прерогатива духа, а разум без духа есть враг всего сущего. Без веры ничто не имеет смысла — ни устремления, ни ограничения. Но вера может принимать разные формы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Паскаль искоса смотрит на вас, и в голосе его вокс-синтезатора возникает потусторонняя глубина.{/n} "Конечно, вера опасна. Вера — прерогатива духа, а разум без духа есть враг всего сущего. Без веры ничто не имеет смысла — ни устремления, ни ограничения. Но вера может принимать разные формы".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal looks at you askance, and the voice from his vox-synthesiser takes on an otherworldly profundity.{/n} "Of course faith is dangerous. Faith is the prerogative of the spirit, and a spiritless mind is an enemy of all existence. Without faith, there is no meaning in anything, no point to any aspirations or limitations. But faith can take different forms."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль искоса смотрит на вас, и в голосе его вокс-синтезатора возникает потусторонняя глубина.{/n} "Конечно, вера опасна. Вера — прерогатива духа, а разум без духа есть враг всего сущего. Без веры ничто не имеет смысла — ни устремления, ни ограничения. Но вера может принимать разные формы".

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡斜视着你。音阵合成器中传来的声音，带着仿佛来自另一个世界的深刻洞见。{/n}“当然，信仰确实很危险。信仰是精神的特权，而没有精神的意识是一切存在的敌人。若是没有信仰，任何事情都没有意义，任何愿望或限制都只不过是空谈。不过，信仰可以有许多不同的形式。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you askance, and the voice from his vox-synthesiser takes on an otherworldly profundity.{/n} "Of course faith is dangerous. Faith is the prerogative of the spirit, and a spiritless mind is an enemy of all existence. Without faith, there is no meaning in anything, no point to any aspirations or limitations. But faith can take different forms."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡斜视着你。音阵合成器中传来的声音，带着仿佛来自另一个世界的深刻洞见。{/n}“当然，信仰确实很危险。信仰是精神的特权，而没有精神的意识是一切存在的敌人。若是没有信仰，任何事情都没有意义，任何愿望或限制都只不过是空谈。不过，信仰可以有许多不同的形式。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal te mira de reojo y la voz que emite su voco sintetizador emite un tono sobrenatural.{/n} «Por supuesto que la fe es peligrosa. La fe es el derecho del espíritu y una mente sin espíritu es enemiga de todo cuanto existe. Sin fe, no hay nada que tenga sentido, no hay aspiraciones ni limitaciones que valgan. Sin embargo, la fe puede adoptar numerosas formas».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you askance, and the voice from his vox-synthesiser takes on an otherworldly profundity.{/n} "Of course faith is dangerous. Faith is the prerogative of the spirit, and a spiritless mind is an enemy of all existence. Without faith, there is no meaning in anything, no point to any aspirations or limitations. But faith can take different forms."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal te mira de reojo y la voz que emite su voco emite un tono sobrenatural.{/n} «Por supuesto que la fe es peligrosa. La fe es el derecho del espíritu y una mente sin espíritu es enemiga de todo cuanto existe. Sin fe, no hay nada que tenga sentido, no hay aspiraciones ni limitaciones que valgan. Sin embargo, la fe puede adoptar numerosas formas».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルはあなたを不審げに見つめる。彼のヴォクス・シンセサイザーはこの世のものではないかのような深遠さを帯びる。{/n}「もちろん信仰は危険だ。信仰は精神の特権であり、精神のない心はすべての存在の敵である。信仰がなければ、何事にも意味はなく、どんな願望や制限にも意味はない。しかし、信仰にはさまざまな形がある」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you askance, and the voice from his vox-synthesiser takes on an otherworldly profundity.{/n} "Of course faith is dangerous. Faith is the prerogative of the spirit, and a spiritless mind is an enemy of all existence. Without faith, there is no meaning in anything, no point to any aspirations or limitations. But faith can take different forms."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルはあなたを不審げに見つめる。彼のヴォクス・シンセサイザーはこの世のものではないかのような深遠さを帯びる。{/n}「もちろん信仰は危険だ。信仰は精神の特権であり、精神のない心はすべての存在の敵である。信仰がなければ、何事にも意味はなく、どんな願望や制限にも意味はない。しかし、信仰にはさまざまな形がある」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal blickt dich schief an, und die Stimme aus seinem Vox-Synthesizer nimmt eine andersweltliche Tiefgründigkeit an.{/n} "Natürlich ist der Glaube gefährlich. Der Glaube ist das Vorreich des Geistes, und ein geistloser Verstand ist ein Feind sämtlicher Existenz. Ohne Glaube ist alles ohne Bedeutung, alle Ambitionen oder Begrenzungen sind sinnlos. Doch der Glaube kann unterschiedliche Formen annehmen."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you askance, and the voice from his vox-synthesiser takes on an otherworldly profundity.{/n} "Of course faith is dangerous. Faith is the prerogative of the spirit, and a spiritless mind is an enemy of all existence. Without faith, there is no meaning in anything, no point to any aspirations or limitations. But faith can take different forms."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal blickt dich schief an, und die Stimme aus seinem Vox-Synthesizer nimmt eine andersweltliche Tiefgründigkeit an.{/n} "Natürlich ist der Glaube gefährlich. Der Glaube ist das Vorreicht des Geistes, und ein geistloser Verstand ist ein Feind sämtlicher Existenz. Ohne Glaube ist alles ohne Bedeutung, alle Ambitionen oder Begrenzungen sind sinnlos. Doch der Glaube kann unterschiedliche Formen annehmen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal vous observe d'un œil soupçonneux et la voix qui émane de son synthétiseur-vox prend une profondeur surnaturelle.{/n} « Bien sûr que la foi est dangereuse. La foi est la prérogative de l'âme, et un esprit sans âme est un ennemi de l'existence. Sans la foi, rien n'a de sens ; les aspirations et les limites n'ont plus aucune raison d'être. Mais la foi peut prendre bien des formes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you askance, and the voice from his vox-synthesiser takes on an otherworldly profundity.{/n} "Of course faith is dangerous. Faith is the prerogative of the spirit, and a spiritless mind is an enemy of all existence. Without faith, there is no meaning in anything, no point to any aspirations or limitations. But faith can take different forms."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal vous observe d'un œil soupçonneux et la voix qui émane de son synthétiseur-vox prend une profondeur surnaturelle.{/n} « Bien sûr que la foi est dangereuse. La foi est la prérogative de l'âme, et un esprit sans âme est un ennemi de l'existence. Sans la foi, rien n'a de sens ; les aspirations et les limites n'ont plus aucune raison d'être. Mais la foi peut prendre bien des formes. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you askance, and the voice from his vox-synthesiser takes on an otherworldly profundity.{/n} "Of course faith is dangerous. Faith is the prerogative of the spirit, and a spiritless mind is an enemy of all existence. Without faith, there is no meaning in anything, no point to any aspirations or limitations. But faith can take different forms."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal sana kuşkuyla bakıyor, voks sentezleyicisinden çıkan seste uhrevi bir derinlik hissediliyor.{/n} "İnanç elbette ki tehlikelidir. İnanç, ruhun sahip olduğu bir ayrıcalıktır. Ruhu olmayan bir zihin, tüm varoluşun düşmanıdır. İnanç olmadan hiçbir şey anlam sahibi olamaz, arzuların da sınırların da hiçbir anlamı kalmaz. Gelgelelim inanç, farklı biçimler alabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal looks at you askance, and the voice from his vox-synthesiser takes on an otherworldly profundity.{/n} "Of course faith is dangerous. Faith is the prerogative of the spirit, and a spiritless mind is an enemy of all existence. Without faith, there is no meaning in anything, no point to any aspirations or limitations. But faith can take different forms."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sana kuşkuyla bakıyor ve voks sentezleyicisinden çıkan ses, dünya dışı bir ihtişam kazanıyor.{/n} "İnanç elbette ki tehlikelidir. İnanç ruhun sahip olduğu bir ayrıcalıktır ve ruhu olmayan bir zihin, tüm varoluşun düşmanıdır. İnanç olmadan hiçbir şey anlam sahibi olamaz, arzuların da sınırlılıkların da hiçbir anlamı kalmaz. İnanç farklı biçimler alabilir ama."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
